definitions.text: soreness and warmth caused by friction
examples: he had a nasty chafe on his knee

definitions.text: anger produced by some annoying irritation
become or make sore by or as if by rubbing

examples: He was chafing at her suggestion that he stay at home while she went on a vacation

definitions.text: cause annoyance in; disturb, especially by minor irritations
examples: Mosquitoes buzzing in my ear really bothers me
It irritates me that she never closes the door after she leaves

definitions.text: tear or wear off the skin or make sore by abrading
examples: This leash chafes the dog's neck

definitions.text: warm by rubbing, as with the hands
